data.name: World of Tanks Blitz - The Plush Matilda
data.detailed_description:
The Matilda IV moves slowly, fires quickly, and—ouch! The camouflage shimmers, mesmerizes, and—ouch, that hurts! What's that jingling sound? It's 3,000 gold, credits, and Premium Account!

This bundle includes:
• Matilda IV Soviet Tier V Premium medium tank + Garage slot
• 9 equipment slots
• Shale Luminescence Epic animated camouflage for the Matilda IV
• 3,000 gold
• 250,000 credits
• 14 days of Premium Account

The Matilda IV is a slow-paced but well-armored tank that can withstand many hits. As it aggressively moves forward, it destroys opponents with its quick-firing gun boasting decent single-shot damage. The 14-degree gun depression angle provides the Matilda IV an additional advantage—it can fight effectively on hilly terrain by exposing only the turret to enemy fire.

Together with the tank, you'll get a certificate for the Shale Luminescence Epic animated camouflage and a solid supply of resources. The gold, credits, and Premium Account will massively boost your progress along the Tech Tree.

Please note that if you already have this vehicle, you will not receive any compensation. This bundle can only be purchased once.

data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Czech*, Finnish*, Japanese*, Korean*, Polish*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Thai*, Traditional Chinese, Turkish*, Portuguese - Brazil*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8.0, 8.1, 10 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compliant video card with 256 MB RAM
  • Storage: 3 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9 Mavericks
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Storage: 3 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Mac OS X 10.9 supported models: https://support.apple.com/kb/SP702
